original: shes pa tha ma shes pa gzhan gyis nyams su myong min na /
analyzed: shes pa tha ma shes pa gzhan gyis nyams su myong min na /

analyzed: tha ma'i shes pa gcig po ma grub na //

analyzed: gzhan gyis nyams su myong ba bzhin //

analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /

analyzed: gal te bdag myong mngon sum yin //

analyzed: gzhan gyis myong ba ma yin na //

analyzed: gal te nyams su myong ba de'i tshe bdag gam gzhan la rnam par dbye bar 'gyur na /

analyzed: dmigs pa ma grub pa yin no //

analyzed: shes pa rang rig pa nyid yin par 'dod par bya'o // tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi 'grel pa /

original: // / tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi 'grel pa /
analyzed: // / tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi 'grel pa /
translated: The Commentary on the Compendium of Valid Knowledge

original: bam po sum cu rtsa drug pa /
analyzed: bam po sum cu rtsa drug pa /
translated: Chapter 36

analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /

original: gzhan @269a * //ğŸ”½don rjes su dpag pa ni //
analyzed: gzhan @269a * // don rjes su dpag pa ni //

analyzed: rang gis mthong ba smos pas ci zhig bya zhe na /

analyzed: gzhan la bstan par bya nyid phyir //

analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /

analyzed: rgyu'i phyir don /

analyzed: gzhan la bstan par bya ba'i phyir //

translated: is the reason established from the scriptures.ğŸ”½In order to abandon that, it is said like this.

analyzed: de spang phyir de skad du brjod pa de nges gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /

translated: Because the establishment that precedes the proofğŸ”½is not established by valid cognition.

original: rtags de ma grub pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: rtags de ma grub pa nyid yin te /

original: lung tsam gyis grub pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lung tsam gyis grub pa med pa'i phyir ro //

original: de ltar na lung ni tshig yin na /
analyzed: de ltar na lung ni tshig yin na /

analyzed: dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa yin //
translated: that is based on the power of fact.ğŸ”½We do not accept that a statement is a valid means of knowledge

original: rjes su dpag pa'i yul la tshig / tshad ma nyid du mi 'dod cing //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i yul la tshig / tshad ma nyid du mi 'dod cing //

translated: Even if scripture is not a valid means of knowledge, it is not a reason for establishing something.

analyzed: 'di ltar lung gi yul 'di la rjes dpag sgrub par byed pa'am / gnod pa can mi 'jug ste /

analyzed: 'dis kyang lung gis grub pa ma yin no //

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /

analyzed: lung la gnod phyir gzhan la ni //

analyzed: bstan par bya ba la ston par byed pa lung la gnod pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa smra ba ni /

original: de tshe lung de tshad min te /
analyzed: de tshe lung de tshad min te /

original: tshad mas gnod pa yin no //
analyzed: tshad mas gnod pa yin no //

original: de'i phyir de grub /
analyzed: de'i phyir de grub /

analyzed: lung grub na rtags ma @269b lus pa grub pa ma yin no //

original: gal te lung de ldan la grub ce na /
analyzed: gal te lung de ldan la grub ce na /

analyzed: lung yang yin la de yang yin pas na lung de'o // de yang gang gis khas blangs pa de ni lung de ldan no //
translated: it is scripture and it is that, so it is that scripture.ğŸ”½He who accepts that is possessed of that scripture.

original: lung de dang ldan pa de la de grub par 'gyur ro zhe na /

original: gal te 'brel pa grub na yang 'gyur mod kyi /

analyzed: gang zhig gang dang lhan cig 'di'i 'di yin no zhes 'brel pa grub pa'i tshad ma yod pa ma yin te /

original: de'i de med pa'i phyir 'brel pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i de med pa'i phyir 'brel pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Because that does not exist for him, the connection does not exist.

original: gzhan yang / tshad ma nyid kyis gnod gyur pa //
analyzed: gzhan yang / tshad ma nyid kyis gnod gyur pa //

analyzed: lung de ji ltar grub pa yin //

analyzed: grub pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: tshad mas gnod pa gang yin pa de ni rtog pa sngon du gtong ba can gyi lung ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: de dang 'gal ba khas blangs pa //
analyzed: de dang 'gal ba khas blangs pa //

analyzed: de nyid kyis ni ji ltar 'gyur //

original: des lung de dor bar 'gyur ba de ltar na /
analyzed: des lung de dor bar 'gyur ba de ltar na /

analyzed: de khas len pa na lung de dor ba'i rgyu'i phyir /

original: de rtogs pa'i yan lag ma yin pas na /
analyzed: de rtogs pa'i yan lag ma yin pas na /
translated: it would not be a branch of understanding.

original: des grub pa rtags su grub pa ma yin no //ğŸ”½de bas na rtags ma grub pas go bar bya ba la tshad ma nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: des grub pa rtags su grub pa ma yin no // de bas na rtags ma grub pas go bar bya ba la tshad ma nyid ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the establishment of the reason is not established.ğŸ”½Thus, since the reason is not established, it is not a valid means of knowledge in regard to what is to be known.

original: de bas na des bsgrub par bya ba ni tshad mas grub par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bas na des bsgrub par bya ba ni tshad mas grub par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the object to be established is not established by a valid means of knowledge. This is the meaning.

analyzed: ston par byed pa rang nyid kyis shes pa'i yan lag 'ga' zhig gis 'gyur zhing /

analyzed: gang gis rang nyid la nges pas gzhan yang ston par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de lta ma yin na gang gi tshe shes pas kho bo sems pa med pa ston par byed pa ma yin no zhes zer ba de'i tshe /
translated: Otherwise, when he says, â€œI, who am not conscious, am not teaching,â€

original: de'i tshig bzhad gad du 'gyur ro //ğŸ”½des na rang shes gang las byung ba /ğŸ”½tshad ma gang las grangs can gyi sems pa med @270a * //
analyzed: de'i tshig bzhad gad du 'gyur ro // des na rang shes gang las byung ba / tshad ma gang las grangs can gyi sems pa med @270a * //
translated: The words of the SÄá¹ƒkhya are laughable.ğŸ”½Therefore, the SÄá¹ƒkhya should explain

original: ba'i shes pa skyes pa ste /ğŸ”½ci phyir sgrub par byed mi smra //
analyzed: ba'i shes pa skyes pa ste / ci phyir sgrub par byed mi smra //
translated: from what kind of valid knowledge the cognition of the nonexistence of mental activity arises.ğŸ”½Why do they not state the proof?

original: sgrub par byed pa de nyid bstan par bya ba la bstan pa'i phyir ci'i phyir mi brjod do //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa de nyid bstan par bya ba la bstan pa'i phyir ci'i phyir mi brjod do //

analyzed: gang gis na lung las gzhan gyi mthong brjod par byed /

analyzed: de ltar na rang dang gzhan gyis khas blangs pa nyid sgrub par byed pa nyid yin no //
translated: Thus, the proof is accepted by both ourselves and others.

original: gal te kho bos gzhan la grub pa'i skye ba la sogs pas bde ba la sogs pa sems pa med pa nyid du khas len pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te kho bos gzhan la grub pa'i skye ba la sogs pas bde ba la sogs pa sems pa med pa nyid du khas len pa ma yin no //
translated: If we do not accept pleasure, etc. as devoid of mental activity by means of arising, etc. that is established for others,

original: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
translated: then what do we accept?

original: rang gi lung la sogs pa las de yin pa de bas na rigs pa gzhan la ma brjod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rang gi lung la sogs pa las de yin pa de bas na rigs pa gzhan la ma brjod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: We accept it on the basis of our own scriptures, etc. Therefore, we do not state the proof to others.

original: de ni gang gi gang lung yin //
analyzed: de ni gang gi gang lung yin //
translated: What is the scripture of whom?

original: zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: zhes bshad zin to //
translated: This has already been explained.

original: rigs pa ni lung dang sbyor bar byed de /
analyzed: rigs pa ni lung dang sbyor bar byed de /
translated: Reasoning is applied to scripture.

original: yongs brtags yongs su len phyir ro //
analyzed: yongs brtags yongs su len phyir ro //
translated: Because it is examined and accepted.

original: de la ston par byed pas lung de rigs pas sam grags pas gzung bar bya ba yin grang na /
analyzed: de la ston par byed pas lung de rigs pas sam grags pas gzung bar bya ba yin grang na /
translated: If it is to be accepted by reasoning or by what is renowned,

original: des lung gang gis sems med par grub par ston par 'gyur /
analyzed: des lung gang gis sems med par grub par ston par 'gyur /
translated: then by what scripture is it established that there is no mind?

original: gal te rigs pas yin pa de'i tshe /ğŸ”½rigs pa gang gis lung gzung yin //
analyzed: gal te rigs pas yin pa de'i tshe / rigs pa gang gis lung gzung yin //
translated: If it is by reasoning,ğŸ”½then by what reasoning is scripture accepted?

original: rigs pa de 'dis kyang bstan par bya ba 'dzin cis ma yin /
analyzed: rigs pa de 'dis kyang bstan par bya ba 'dzin cis ma yin /
translated: Why is it not accepted that this reasoning also teaches what is to be accepted?

original: ci'i phyir 'dzin par byed pa po ma yin /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'dzin par byed pa po ma yin /
translated: Why is it not the one who accepts?

original: gzhan yang de nyid sems pa med pa sgrub par byed pa khas blangs pa 'dzin par byed pa por 'gyur ba /ğŸ”½de ltar na skye ba la sogs pa sgrub par byed par brjod pa nus pa med cing /
analyzed: gzhan yang de nyid sems pa med pa sgrub par byed pa khas blangs pa 'dzin par byed pa por 'gyur ba / de ltar na skye ba la sogs pa sgrub par byed par brjod pa nus pa med cing /
translated: Moreover, it would be the one who accepts the proof of that very absence of mind.

original: don med pa yin no //
analyzed: don med pa yin no //
translated: Thus the statement that birth and so on are established is ineffective and pointless.

original: ci ste rigs pas gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: ci ste rigs pas gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: de nyid tshad ma dang bcas pa ma yin pa de ltar na gzung bar bya ba nyid ma yin no //
translated: If it is not established by a valid cognition, then it is not to be apprehended.

original: de bas na des grub pa'i sems pa med pa nyid ma grub pa yin no //ğŸ”½gal te rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i mngon sum gyis sems pa med pa nges pa de ni rnam pa gzhan du bya bar mi nus pa des /
analyzed: de bas na des grub pa'i sems pa med pa nyid ma grub pa yin no // gal te rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i mngon sum gyis sems pa med pa nges pa de ni rnam pa gzhan du bya bar mi nus pa des /
translated: Therefore, the nonexistence of the mind that is established by that is not established.

analyzed: rnam ba 'ga' zhig gis gzhan la bstan par bya ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If the nonexistence of the mind is ascertained by a perception that arises from yoga, and if that cannot be done in any other way, then it should be taught to others by some means.

analyzed: de la ston par byed pa'i mngon sum gyi shes pa glo bur du skye ba ni ma yin no//

analyzed: gnod pa bya ba dang gnod bar byed pa'i 'brel pa gzhan yod pa ni ma yin gyi /
translated: and the proof that is produced by the practice of the means of valid cognition,ğŸ”½and the proof that is produced by the practice of the means of valid cognition

analyzed: de la gnod par byed pa'i stong pa nyid du lta ba goms pa dang / de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por 'brel pa yin pa de ltar na /
translated: The view of emptiness that refutes that is cultivated, and the connection between cause and effect is established in the nature of that emptiness.

analyzed: thar pa dngos po'i stobs las byung ba yin no //

translated: In the same way, here, the direct perception and the proof of that are taught to be the fact of the probandum and the proof. Thus, the direct perception that establishes the absence of conception in the object would exist in that way.

analyzed: de lta ma yin na ston par byed pas don 'di shes pa nyid ma yin gyi /
translated: If that were not so, the teacher would not know the meaning himself.

analyzed: sems pa med pa nyid gzung bar bya ba nyid ma yin par 'gyur ro //

translated: It is true that this is so, but the direct perception that is to be established and the means of establishing it do not exist in some cases,

analyzed: 'brel pa bskal pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the connection is remote.

original: spyis kyang shes pa ma yin pas de ma bstan pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: spyis kyang shes pa ma yin pas de ma bstan pa yin no zhe na /
translated: And since the universal is not a cognition, it is not taught.ğŸ”½If that is so,

analyzed: gal te de lta yin pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: gang yang 'brel pa rnam chad can //

original: yang gi sgra ni dang gi don yin te /
analyzed: yang gi sgra ni dang gi don yin te /
translated: The word â€œalsoâ€ has the meaning of â€œand.â€

original: gang dang de ltar 'brel pa chad ba can ni /
analyzed: gang dang de ltar 'brel pa chad ba can ni /
translated: That which has a connection that is severedğŸ”½The universal does not have a connection with that.

original: spyis kyang spyod yul ma yin pa'i don yul ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: spyis kyang spyod yul ma yin pa'i don yul ma yin pa'o //
translated: The universal is not an object that is not an object of cognition.

original: 'brel pa bskal pa can gyi don de dag la bsgrub bya dang / sgrub byed spyod pa cung zad med //
analyzed: 'brel pa bskal pa can gyi don de dag la bsgrub bya dang / sgrub byed spyod pa cung zad med //
translated: In those objects whose connection is remote, there is no activity whatsoever of the means of establishing and the object of the means of establishing.

original: de ltar na gzhan la bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar na gzhan la bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Thus, in order to teach this to others,

original: sgrub par byed pa dgod par bya ba ma yin te /ğŸ”½de ni yul de 'dra ba la @271a * //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa dgod par bya ba ma yin te / de ni yul de 'dra ba la @271a * //
translated: the means of establishing is not to be set forth,

original: go bar byed pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: go bar byed pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is not the means of understanding in that kind of object.

original: gzhan yang bstan par bya ba yang 'dod pa tsam gyis lung 'dzin par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: gzhan yang bstan par bya ba yang 'dod pa tsam gyis lung 'dzin par 'gyur zhing /
translated: Moreover, the scriptures would be apprehended by mere desire.

original: lung des skye ba la sogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa rab tu sgrub par byed pa de bas na gang gi tshe sems pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: lung des skye ba la sogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa rab tu sgrub par byed pa de bas na gang gi tshe sems pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
translated: And since that scripture would establish the proof of arising and so on, then at that time, when it would be mindless,

analyzed: skyes bu'i bsam pa'i dbang gis dngos po'i de kho na nyid dang / de kho na nyid ma yin pa rnam par gzhag par 'gyur ro //
translated: the reality and unreality of things would be posited by the power of the mind of a person.

original: de lta na yang /
analyzed: de lta na yang /
translated: Even so,ğŸ”½The reality and unreality of things

original: skyes bu'i bsam pa'i dbang dag gis //
analyzed: skyes bu'i bsam pa'i dbang dag gis //
translated: Are posited by the power of the mind of a person.

original: de nyid de nyid min rnam gzhag / byed pa yin na gtan tshigs dang // der snang ba dag skyes bu'i 'dod pa tsam gyis nye bar btags pa yin par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de nyid de nyid min rnam gzhag / byed pa yin na gtan tshigs dang // der snang ba dag skyes bu'i 'dod pa tsam gyis nye bar btags pa yin par 'gyur gyi /
translated: If that is done, then the reason and the appearance of that would be mere imputations by the desire of a person.

original: don dam pa rnam par gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid can ma yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: don dam pa rnam par gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid can ma yin pa de ltar na /
translated: They would not be characterized by the ultimate nature.ğŸ”½In that case,

original: gtan tshigs der snang med 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs der snang med 'gyur ro //
translated: The appearance of the reason would not exist.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

analyzed: skyes bu'i bsam pa de ni dngos rten min phyir ro //
translated: Because the intention of a person is not a real basis.

original: de ni dngos po la nges par 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni dngos po la nges par 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not definitely engage with a real entity.

original: gtan tshigs su mngon par 'dod pa gang yin pa de nyid rtags yin zhing /
analyzed: gtan tshigs su mngon par 'dod pa gang yin pa de nyid rtags yin zhing /
translated: Whatever is asserted as a reason is a sign.

original: de nyid rnam grangs gzhan gyis kyang mi 'dod pa de ltar na /
analyzed: de nyid rnam grangs gzhan gyis kyang mi 'dod pa de ltar na /
translated: And that is not asserted in another way.

original: gtan tshigs ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ma yin pa'i phyir /

original: gtan tshigs dang der snang ba dag rang bzhin du gnas pa can ma yin na /
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang der snang ba dag rang bzhin du gnas pa can ma yin na /
translated: If a reason and the appearance of that are not established by nature,ğŸ”½Moreover,

original: gzhan yang / don yod shes la ltos bcas yin //
analyzed: gzhan yang / don yod shes la ltos bcas yin //
translated: It depends on the cognition of an existent object.

original: sgrub par byed pa yin gyi don dam par don med pas shes pas te /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa yin gyi don dam par don med pas shes pas te /
translated: It is an establishment, not a cognition of a nonexistent object.

original: shes pa tsam gyis sgrub byed min //
analyzed: shes pa tsam gyis sgrub byed min //

analyzed: dper na me la kun du brtags pa'i du ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, like smoke imagined in fire.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: That is so, but

analyzed: gal te mi rtag pa nyid dang // skye ba la sogs pa rtags su ma grub pa yin pa de ltar na yang /
translated: Even if impermanence and arising, etc. are not established as reasons,

analyzed: don dam par bde ba la sogs pa ni sems pa med pa nyid du yod pa yin no //
translated: In the ultimate sense, pleasure, etc. exist as non-mental.ğŸ”½It is endowed with qualities by the arrangement of entities.

original: de ni dngos po'i bkod pas yon tan dang ldan pa yin no zhes rnam ba 'ga' zhig gis gzhan la bstan par bya ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de ni dngos po'i bkod pas yon tan dang ldan pa yin no zhes rnam ba 'ga' zhig gis gzhan la bstan par bya ba yin no zhe na /
translated: That is to be shown to others in some way.

original: de dang de yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de dang de yod pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: 'di ltar yod na yang /
analyzed: 'di ltar yod na yang /
translated: Even if it exists,

original: yon tan dang ldan pa'i don yang ngo//
analyzed: yon tan dang ldan pa'i don yang ngo//
translated: the meaning of being endowed with qualities is also.

original: dngos dang 'brel pa med pa'i ste //
analyzed: dngos dang 'brel pa med pa'i ste //
translated: Without a connection with an entity,

original: dngos por gyur pa ma yin pa'i rtags kyi sgo nas kyang 'ongs pa'i rtogs pa de khong du chud pa de med rtogs yon tan dang ldan pa med par rtogs pa dang 'dra ba yin no //
analyzed: dngos por gyur pa ma yin pa'i rtags kyi sgo nas kyang 'ongs pa'i rtogs pa de khong du chud pa de med rtogs yon tan dang ldan pa med par rtogs pa dang 'dra ba yin no //

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: tshad ma nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad ma nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not valid cognition.

original: de ltar na gal te tshad ma'i @271b stobs las 'khrul pa dang 'khrul pa ma yin pa rnam par 'jog par byed pa de med na /
analyzed: de ltar na gal te tshad ma'i @271b stobs las 'khrul pa dang 'khrul pa ma yin pa rnam par 'jog par byed pa de med na /
translated: Thus, if there is no valid cognition that posits error and non-error from the power of valid cognition,

analyzed: gang las 'di 'khrul pa'am ma yin na zhes nges par 'gyur / gzhan yang / rang bzhin dag gam 'bras bu'am //
translated: How could it be ascertained that this is a mistake or not?ğŸ”½Moreover,ğŸ”½it is the very establishment of an entity, whether it is a nature, an effect,

original: dngos po sgrub par byed pa nyid yin pa /ğŸ”½snang ba mthong ba med pa nyid //
analyzed: dngos po sgrub par byed pa nyid yin pa / snang ba mthong ba med pa nyid //
translated: or a cause.ğŸ”½The nonexistence of seeing appearances

original: snang ba ste don no mthong ba med nyid de /
analyzed: snang ba ste don no mthong ba med nyid de /
translated: is the nonexistence of seeing objects.

original: mi dmigs pa med pa'i tha snyad 'jug par byed pa yin pa de ltar na rnam pa gsum yin no //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa med pa'i tha snyad 'jug par byed pa yin pa de ltar na rnam pa gsum yin no //
translated: The nonexistence of nonobservation is what causes the term to be applied. In this way, there are three types.

original: rtags 'brel pa ste /
analyzed: rtags 'brel pa ste /
translated: The sign is the connection

original: go bar byed pa yin gyi go bar byed pa gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: go bar byed pa yin gyi go bar byed pa gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: that causes understanding. There is no other cause of understanding.

original: gal te gsum po de dag gi nang du skye ba la sogs pa 'dus pa yin pa de'i tshe de dngos grub yin na /
analyzed: gal te gsum po de dag gi nang du skye ba la sogs pa 'dus pa yin pa de'i tshe de dngos grub yin na /
translated: If birth, etc., are included among those three, then they are established entities.

original: skye ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Birth, etc.,

original: grangs can rang la ci'i phyir ma grub /
analyzed: grangs can rang la ci'i phyir ma grub /
translated: Why are they not established for the SÄá¹ƒkhya themselves?

original: gnyi ga la grub pa yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnyi ga la grub pa yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: They would be established for both.

original: ci ste nang du 'dus pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: ci ste nang du 'dus pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: bstan par bya ba gzhan gyis kyang gzhan te /

original: tshul gsum pa'i rtags las sems pa med pa rtogs pa ni /ğŸ”½khong du chud pa la /
analyzed: tshul gsum pa'i rtags las sems pa med pa rtogs pa ni / khong du chud pa la /
translated: is not a matter of understanding something that is not already understood.

original: mi rigs pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: mi rigs pa nyid yin no //
translated: It is not reasonable.

analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba spyir 'dod na //
translated: â€œIf the probandum is asserted in general,

original: don gzhan gang yang rung ba spyir bsgrub par bya bar 'dod pa des khyad par can 'phel bar byed pa ma yin phyir skyon yod pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: don gzhan gang yang rung ba spyir bsgrub par bya bar 'dod pa des khyad par can 'phel bar byed pa ma yin phyir skyon yod pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: then there is no fault because the other thing that is asserted as the probandum in general does not increase the particular.â€

original: de nyid spyir bsgrub par bya ba lus khas len med grub mi 'gyur /
analyzed: de nyid spyir bsgrub par bya ba lus khas len med grub mi 'gyur /
translated: That itself is not established as the probandum in general, because the body is not accepted.

original: lus don gzhan du gyur pa'i dngos po len pa med na /
analyzed: lus don gzhan du gyur pa'i dngos po len pa med na /
translated: If the body is not accepted as the other thing,

original: gnyi ga la don gzhan med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gnyi ga la don gzhan med pa'i phyir /
translated: then there is no other thing in both.

original: rgyu'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the cause.

original: gnyi ga la don gzhan du gyur pa'i dngos po yod na gang yang rung ba'i rten yin na /
analyzed: gnyi ga la don gzhan du gyur pa'i dngos po yod na gang yang rung ba'i rten yin na /
translated: If there is an existent other thing in both, then either one is the basis.

original: de yang yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: de yang yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na /
translated: And if it does not exist,

original: spyi bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: spyi bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: then the universal is not established.

original: gzhan yang bum pa la rang las don gzhan du gyur pa'i dngos po yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang bum pa la rang las don gzhan du gyur pa'i dngos po yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, a pot does not exist as a thing that is different from itself,

original: 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is contradictory.

original: lus kyang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i dogs pas 'dod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: lus kyang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i dogs pas 'dod pa ma yin te /
translated: And the body is not accepted because it is suspected of being without a universal.

original: gang yang rung ba nyid kyi rten dang bral ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gang yang rung ba nyid kyi rten dang bral ba'i phyir /
translated: Because it is devoid of a substratum that is any one of them.

original: tshig 'ga' zhig don gyis stong pa yin te /
analyzed: tshig 'ga' zhig don gyis stong pa yin te /
translated: Some words are empty of meaning,

original: brjod byas stong pa'i brjod pa rnams de de skad du bshad pa'i tshig mi shes kyis bslang zhing blun pas bslangs shing bskyed pa yin no //
analyzed: brjod byas stong pa'i brjod pa rnams de de skad du bshad pa'i tshig mi shes kyis bslang zhing blun pas bslangs shing bskyed pa yin no //
translated: because they are expressions that are empty of what is to be expressed. They are generated by those who do not know how to explain the words in that way and by fools.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: This is certainly so.

original: gal te sgra don khyad par gyis rtog na /
analyzed: gal te sgra don khyad par gyis rtog na /

original: byed na 'jig la'ang mtshungs pa yin //
analyzed: byed na 'jig la'ang mtshungs pa yin //

original: sgra mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la yang /
analyzed: sgra mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la yang /

original: don gang yang rung ba la dmigs pa na /
analyzed: don gang yang rung ba la dmigs pa na /

analyzed: bum pa dang sgra'i khyad par la rtog pas skyon mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: The difference between the pot and sound is imagined by conceptual thought.

original: 'di lta ste mi rtag pa spyir gyur pa bsgrub par bya ba dag ni sgra mi rtag pa nyid du bum pa'i mi rtag pa nyid nas tha dad par rtog pa na 'di la'ang skyon du 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di lta ste mi rtag pa spyir gyur pa bsgrub par bya ba dag ni sgra mi rtag pa nyid du bum pa'i mi rtag pa nyid nas tha dad par rtog pa na 'di la'ang skyon du 'gyur te /
translated: For example, when one imagines that impermanence in general is the probandum, and that the impermanence of sound is different from the impermanence of a pot, then this error would also occur.

original: ji ltar sgra la sgra'i mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no ste /
analyzed: ji ltar sgra la sgra'i mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no ste /

original: rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i dogs pas khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i dogs pas khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the doubt that there is no concomitance, it is not accepted.

original: bum pa'i mi rtag pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: bum pa'i mi rtag pa nyid kyang ma yin te /

original: mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi srid pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba gzhan yang yod pa ma yin no //

original: de lta na sgra dang bum pa dag tha dad par rtog pa la /
analyzed: de lta na sgra dang bum pa dag tha dad par rtog pa la /

analyzed: khas blangs pa la sogs pa dang 'gal ba'am bsgrub par bya bas stong pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: there would be the error of contradicting what is accepted and so on, or of the probandum being empty.

original: skyon de dang de yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: skyon de dang de yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Those errors do not exist.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: 'jig pa grub pa yis /
analyzed: 'jig pa grub pa yis /
translated: Because destruction is established.

original: de lta na sgra ni grub phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta na sgra ni grub phyir ro //
translated: In that case, sound is established,

original: mi rtag pa grub pa nyid kyis sgra mi rtag par sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mi rtag pa grub pa nyid kyis sgra mi rtag par sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

analyzed: kho bo cag ni bum pa dang rtsig pa la gang yang rung ba don gzhan nyid bsgrub par bya bar 'dod pa nye bar 'god pa rjes su 'gro ba ma yin no zhes /

original: bsgrub par bya @277a * //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya @277a * //

original: pas stod pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin par ni mi smra'i /
analyzed: pas stod pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin par ni mi smra'i /

original: 'on kyang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos de 'dra ba nyid dpyad na ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos de 'dra ba nyid dpyad na ma grub pa yin no //

original: de ltar 'di la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar 'di la ni ma yin no //

original: de ltar na 'jig pa spyir grub pa nyid kyis de dang ldan par phyis sgra bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na 'jig pa spyir grub pa nyid kyis de dang ldan par phyis sgra bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Thus, by the mere establishment of destruction in general, later sound is established as possessing that.

original: gang yang rung ba don gzhan du gyur pa 'ga' zhig kyang grub pa yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: gang yang rung ba don gzhan du gyur pa 'ga' zhig kyang grub pa yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na /
translated: If something that is a different object from the pot or the wall is not established at all,ğŸ”½then

original: gang gis na gang yang rung ba de ltar don gzhan yod na /
analyzed: gang gis na gang yang rung ba de ltar don gzhan yod na /
translated: If it is asked by what means, it is the means of the lamp of the watery far-reaching lasso.ğŸ”½

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: If it were so, then

original: bum pa yang gang yang rung ba gnyis pa dang bcas pa'i bum par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bum pa yang gang yang rung ba gnyis pa dang bcas pa'i bum par 'gyur ro //

translated: Just as impermanence is related to sound, so the probandum is not empty.

original: de ltar ma yin na /
analyzed: de ltar ma yin na /

analyzed: gcig la mi rtag pa gnyis su thal bar 'gyur ro //

original: de bas na mi rtag pa nyid kyi spyi sgra'i rten la bsgrub par bya ba yin pa de ltar na skyon yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na mi rtag pa nyid kyi spyi sgra'i rten la bsgrub par bya ba yin pa de ltar na skyon yod pa ma yin no //

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /

analyzed: gal te sgras khyad par mi rtag ces mi 'jug / chos can sgras khyad par du byas pa'i mi rtag pa nyid rjes su 'jug pa med pa de ltar na /

original: bsgrub par bya ba des stong pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba des stong pa yin no zhe na /
translated: the probandum is empty of that.

original: skyon de yong pa ma yin no //
analyzed: skyon de yong pa ma yin no //

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: mi ldan ldog phyir ro //
analyzed: mi ldan ldog phyir ro //
translated: because of the exclusion of the non-possession.

analyzed: ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod par khyad par du byas pa'i phyir ro // mi ldan gzhan dang ldan pa dag / rnam gcod phyir na /

original: ma 'brel pa dang gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa dag gis /
analyzed: ma 'brel pa dang gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa dag gis /

original: rnam gcod ni rnam gnyis te /
analyzed: rnam gcod ni rnam gnyis te /

original: khyad par du byas pa yin zhes sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: khyad par du byas pa yin zhes sngar bshad zin to //
translated: The specification has been explained above.

original: de la mi ldan pa /
analyzed: de la mi ldan pa /
translated: Therein, the non-possession

analyzed: bzlog la ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa byas pa na / gzhan dang 'brel ba ldog par mi 'gyur ba de ltar na /
translated: is the exclusion of the non-connection,ğŸ”½but not the exclusion of the possession of another.

original: rjes 'gro med pa yin /
analyzed: rjes 'gro med pa yin /

original: bsgrub par bya bas stong pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya bas stong pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is not empty of the probandum, is the meaning.

original: de spyi mi rtag pa nyid /
analyzed: de spyi mi rtag pa nyid /

original: bsgrub par bya ba yin pas /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba yin pas /
translated: is the probandum.

original: grub pa la sgrub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: grub pa la sgrub pa ma yin te /

analyzed: ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa ma grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

analyzed: gang byas pa de ni mi rtag pa yin no zhes bya bas /

analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid kyis khyab pas bstan pa dang / sgra yang byas pa yin no zhes bya bas phyogs kyi chos bstan pa'i shugs kyis /

original: sgra mi rtag pa nyid du grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra mi rtag pa nyid du grub pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: ma 'brel pa rnam par gcad pa'i spyis kyang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon gyi dogs par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de de ltar na ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pas khyad par du byas pa'i phyir /

original: de de mi rtag pa nyid kyi spyi /
analyzed: de de mi rtag pa nyid kyi spyi /

analyzed: sgra chos can gyi khyad par can rjes 'gro med pa'i skyon ldan med do //

original: 'dod pa bsgrub @277b par bya ba'i tshig 'dis ni /
analyzed: 'dod pa bsgrub @277b par bya ba'i tshig 'dis ni /
translated: By this statement that establishes the thesis,

original: gang byas pa de ni mi rtag pa yin te /
analyzed: gang byas pa de ni mi rtag pa yin te /
translated: whatever is produced is impermanent,ğŸ”½and sound is also produced.

original: sgra yang byas pa yin no zhes bya ba de bzhin du gtan tshigs chos can sgras khyad par du byas pa'i mi rtag pa nyid sgra la med do zhes sgrub par byed cing /

analyzed: de bzhin du chos mi rtag pa nyid kyi chos kyi khyad par du byas pa'i sgra med par sgrub par byed pa de ltar na / chos can chos dag gis /

original: chos dang chos can khyad par can //
analyzed: chos dang chos can khyad par can //

original: 'gog par byed pa'i rgol ba bsal ba yin te /
analyzed: 'gog par byed pa'i rgol ba bsal ba yin te /
translated: This is the refutation of the opponent who refutes the contradiction.

original: ji ltar skyon 'di yod pa ma yin no zhe'o //ğŸ”½ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar skyon 'di yod pa ma yin no zhe'o // ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: How is this fault not present?

original: chos can de ltar mi sgrub phyir /ğŸ”½sgra chos can la spyi bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa gang gis na de las bzlog pa sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: chos can de ltar mi sgrub phyir / sgra chos can la spyi bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa gang gis na de las bzlog pa sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi phyir /

original: 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur /
analyzed: 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur /
translated: The property of sound is not to be established as a universal, and thus it is not the case that the opposite is being established, and so there is no contradiction.

original: de'i phyir tshogs pa dmigs kyis bkar ba ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir tshogs pa dmigs kyis bkar ba ni /

original: chos can la ni 'gal ba med //
analyzed: chos can la ni 'gal ba med //

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

analyzed: gang phyir de ltar sgrub pa mi 'dod pas so //

analyzed: 'o na ci yin zhe na /

analyzed: sgra 'dir chos 'ba' zhig bsgrub bya yin /

analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i yin par 'dod do //
translated: Impermanence and so on are accepted.

original: de lta ma yin na sgra mi rtag par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na sgra mi rtag par mi 'gyur ro //

original: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci yin zhe na /

analyzed: sgra mi rtag pa sgra la sgrub par 'dod par 'gyur ro //

original: de yang 'dod pa ma yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: de yang 'dod pa ma yin pa de ltar na /

original: de las bzlog pa la 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no /
analyzed: de las bzlog pa la 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no /

original: // / da ni bdag nyid smos pa 'chad par byed de /ğŸ”½chos can gcig la'ang bstan bcos kyi //
analyzed: // / da ni bdag nyid smos pa 'chad par byed de / chos can gcig la'ang bstan bcos kyi //
translated: Now, he explains the mention of â€œhimselfâ€:ğŸ”½Even though many Dharmas of the treatise

original: chos rnams du ma khas len kyang //
analyzed: chos rnams du ma khas len kyang //

original: bstan bcos las khas blangs su zin kyang /
analyzed: bstan bcos las khas blangs su zin kyang /

analyzed: gal te bstan bcos byed pa des chos can gcig la nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa'i chos mang po mngon par 'dod pa de lta na yang gang zhig sgrub par byed pa 'god par byed pa des bdag nyid 'dod pa ste /

analyzed: mi rtag nyid la sogs pa bsgrub par bya bar 'dod pa de nyid rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis bsgrub byar 'gyur gyi /

analyzed: bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa ni ma yin no //

original: slob dpon gyis de ltar bstan pa'i don du bdag nyid sgra smos so //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis de ltar bstan pa'i don du bdag nyid sgra smos so //
translated: The Master himself mentions the word â€œsoundâ€ in order to show that.ğŸ”½If, because of accepting a treatise,

analyzed: gal te bstan bcos khas blangs phyir // rgyu nyid kyi phyir des bstan pa'i chos thams cad bsgrub par bya ba nyid du gzung bar bya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe /

original: thams cad bzung bas ji ltar khas blangs pa'i chos kyi tshogs las chos gcig la yang /
analyzed: thams cad bzung bas ji ltar khas blangs pa'i chos kyi tshogs las chos gcig la yang /

original: rab tu gnod pa ste /ğŸ”½yin na / bstan tshigs dang / dam bca' ba dag skyon te /
analyzed: rab tu gnod pa ste / yin na / bstan tshigs dang / dam bca' ba dag skyon te /

original: gtan tshigs 'gal bar 'gyur na'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'gal bar 'gyur na'o //

analyzed: ci ste bstan bcos yongs su bzung ba med par yang /

analyzed: grub pa la gags byed pa med na /

translated: Even if the connection is not established, or even if it is not possible to establish it, the fact that the subject is established in the context of the root text proves that the probandum would not occur without it. This is the meaning.

analyzed: gal te bstan bcos kyi don la gnod par bya ba la bsgrub par bya bar 'dod pa nyid grub par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If the probandum is what is to be harmed in the meaning of the treatise, then the mere wish to establish it will not be established.

analyzed: de dang de yod pa ma yin te / 'di ltar bsgrub par bya ba'i /
translated: That is not so.ğŸ”½Because the subject of the probandum

analyzed: ma lus pa /
translated: without exception.

analyzed: dpe ni nye bar 'god ma yin /
translated: No example can be posited.

analyzed: 'gro ba sems ldan me la sogs //

analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba /

analyzed: rjes su dpog gang las she na //

analyzed: tshig dang dud sogs las te rang gi bsgrub par bya ba med na med pa'i rtags las so //

analyzed: dper na skyes bu 'di sems dang ldan pa yin te /

original: smra ba'i phyir /
analyzed: smra ba'i phyir /

analyzed: bdag bzhin no zhes bya bsgrub par byed pa'i byed pa po skyes bu las tha dad pa'i don dam pa'i skyes bu med pa yang sgrub par byed pa de ltar na 'gal ba brjod pa yin na yang /

analyzed: sems dang ldan pa rtogs par 'gyur pa lta bu'o //

analyzed: du ba dngos por 'gyur pa las me dang ldan pa'i sa phyogs bsgrub par bya ba la da ltar dang 'dir khyod kyi 'dod pa'i bsgrub par bya ba nyid du mngon par 'dod pa'i me dang 'brel pa med na yang sgrub par byed do zhes bshad pa na
translated: In the proof that a place possessing fire is the thesis, the presence of smoke is the proof, even though there is no relation of the fire which you desire to the thesis, which is manifest here and now.

original: yang shugs kyis mi 'grub pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: yang shugs kyis mi 'grub pa lta bu'o //
translated: This is explained as not established by implication.

original: gzhan yang rang bzhin dang ste shing la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang rang bzhin dang ste shing la sogs pa lta bu'o //

original: rgyu ni sems la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu ni sems la sogs pa'o //
translated: The cause is mind, etc.

analyzed: don gyis ni rang bzhin du gyur pa'i shing sha pa la sogs pa'am 'bras bu du ba la sogs pas so //
translated: By the word nature, a tree, etc., which is natural, or by the word effect, smoke, etc., is meant.

original: 'khrul pa med par sgrub pa na /
analyzed: 'khrul pa med par sgrub pa na /
translated: When establishing the absence of error,

analyzed: rgol ba 'ga' zhig gi rtsod gnod pa la /
translated: some opponents argue that the reason is harmed.

original: de la gnod pa'i phyir rang bzhin bdag nyid las de med na mi 'byung ba'i don ldog par mi 'gyur na gang gis ni rang gi yul la shes pa skyed par mi byed /
analyzed: de la gnod pa'i phyir rang bzhin bdag nyid las de med na mi 'byung ba'i don ldog par mi 'gyur na gang gis ni rang gi yul la shes pa skyed par mi byed /
translated: If the meaning-distinguisher, which is the meaning that does not arise without it, does not occur in the reason, then how could it generate the cognition of its object?

original: rtogs par byed pa gzhan gyis kyang /
analyzed: rtogs par byed pa gzhan gyis kyang /
translated: The other, which is the realizer,

translated: is the object to be established by the person. The reason is the reason that does not occur without it.

original: gyi gtan tshigs la don rtogs pa gang yin pa de nyid med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyis gtan tshigs la de rtogs pa gang yin pa de nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i don nyid du grub pa yin no zhes de nyid kyis rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: gyi gtan tshigs la don rtogs pa gang yin pa de nyid med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyis gtan tshigs la de rtogs pa gang yin pa de nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i don nyid du grub pa yin no zhes de nyid kyis rtogs pa yin no //
translated: The realization of the object by that reason is established as the object to be proven by the non-occurrence of that very realization in the reason. Thus, it is realized by that very [reason].

original: gzhan yang skabs la bab pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i chos sgrub par byed pas bstan bcos kyi don gang las gnod par byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan yang skabs la bab pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i chos sgrub par byed pas bstan bcos kyi don gang las gnod par byed par 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, since the treatise establishes the object of affirmation that is relevant to the occasion, how could the meaning of the treatise be undermined?

translated: Thus, when any property of any treatise or any reason is refuted, any other property of that same subject is also refuted by the conclusion of the refutation of the reason.

analyzed: sgra la skabs su bab pa'i gtan tshigs kyis gnod par 'gyur /

original: gzhan gyis gzhan la min no zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan gyis gzhan la min no zhe na /
translated: If another property of the subject is not refuted by another reason,

analyzed: de bden ma yin no // 'di ltar gtan tshigs kun rang bsgrub bya la /
translated: then that is not so.ğŸ”½Thus, all reasons are related to their own probandum,

analyzed: gzhan yang / bsgrub bya la med mi 'byung ba'i //

analyzed: skabs su bab pa ma yin pa bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa bzlog pa la / mi 'dod do //
translated: It is not the case that the opposite of the unestablished property to be proven is to be proven.ğŸ”½It is not accepted.

original: ldan pa dang / rnam par phye ba dang 'phrod pa 'du ba'i rgyu ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa'i chos bzlog pa'i phyir /

analyzed: bstan bcos kyi don la gnod pa yin pa de na /

analyzed: 'di ni bstan bcos gnod 'ba' zhig / skyon yin no //
translated: This is the only fault that undermines the treatise.

original: de gzhan gyis byas te /
analyzed: de gzhan gyis byas te /
translated: Others say that this is done by another,

original: gzhan brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i gtan tshigs kyis dril sogs pa'i chos can gzhan la sa'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa zlog par byed pa mtshungs shing 'dra ba yin no //
analyzed: gzhan brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i gtan tshigs kyis dril sogs pa'i chos can gzhan la sa'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa zlog par byed pa mtshungs shing 'dra ba yin no //
translated: because the reason that it arises immediately after the other is sought is similar to the reversal of the properties of the subject, such as the quality of earth, in other cases.

original: de bas na sgra la byas pa nyid la sogs pa 'dod pa sgrub par byed pa yang skyon dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na sgra la byas pa nyid la sogs pa 'dod pa sgrub par byed pa yang skyon dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the proof of the thesis that sound is produced and so on also has faults.

original: gzhan yang gal te bstan bcos khas blangs phyir /
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te bstan bcos khas blangs phyir /
translated: Moreover, if one argues that

original: rgyu'i phyir / bstan bcos mthong ba yis don ma lus bsgrub par bya ba yin par rgol ba de 'dod pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: rgyu'i phyir / bstan bcos mthong ba yis don ma lus bsgrub par bya ba yin par rgol ba de 'dod pa de'i tshe /
translated: the entire meaning is to be established by seeing the treatise because of accepting the treatise,

original: dpe dang gtan tshigs ma grub smra /
analyzed: dpe dang gtan tshigs ma grub smra /
translated: then the example and reason are said to be unestablished.

original: dam bca' bar ni thal par 'gyur /
analyzed: dam bca' bar ni thal par 'gyur /
translated: The thesis would be reduced to a consequence.

original: gang gi tshe rgol ba 'ga' zhig gis rang gi bstan bcos las bstan pa'i dpe dang gtan tshigs ma grub par bstan par bya ba la ston par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rgol ba 'ga' zhig gis rang gi bstan bcos las bstan pa'i dpe dang gtan tshigs ma grub par bstan par bya ba la ston par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
translated: When an opponent points out that the example and reason stated in a treatise are not established, then at that time

original: de gnyis kyi tshig kyang dam bca' bar 'gyur @283a * //
analyzed: de gnyis kyi tshig kyang dam bca' bar 'gyur @283a * //
translated: those two words would be a thesis,

original: te / bstan bcos la mthong ba'i ma grub pa ni bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: te / bstan bcos la mthong ba'i ma grub pa ni bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the nonestablishment seen in a treatise is itself the probandum.

original: de ltar 'gyur ba ni bden te /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur ba ni bden te /
translated: That this is so is true,

original: gal te sgrub byed nyid brjod pa ma yin 'dod pa smra phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te sgrub byed nyid brjod pa ma yin 'dod pa smra phyir ro //
translated: but if the probandum itself is not stated, then the thesis is not stated, because the proponentâ€™s assertion is not stated.

original: de ni rigs pas thob pa yin te /ğŸ”½'on kyang bsgrub par bya ba nyid 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i tshig mdzad cing /
analyzed: de ni rigs pas thob pa yin te / 'on kyang bsgrub par bya ba nyid 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i tshig mdzad cing /
translated: That is obtained through reasoning,ğŸ”½but still the word â€œprobandumâ€ is used,

original: gzhan du yang rang gi ngo bo kho na zhes bya ba'i nges par gzung ba byas pa de'i phyir 'dod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig de las bsgrub par bya ba nyid du brjod pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan du yang rang gi ngo bo kho na zhes bya ba'i nges par gzung ba byas pa de'i phyir 'dod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig de las bsgrub par bya ba nyid du brjod pa ste /
translated: and elsewhere the specification â€œonlyâ€ is used, as in â€œonly its nature is stated.â€ Therefore, the word â€œprobandumâ€ and so on is used in the statement â€œthe probandum is stated.â€

original: sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'dod pa'i dpe dang gtan tshigs ma grub pa dag gis dam bca' bar thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'dod pa'i dpe dang gtan tshigs ma grub pa dag gis dam bca' bar thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas pa yin no zhe na /
translated: The response is that the example and reason that are asserted to be the proof are not established.

original: de la gal te dpe dang gtan tshigs ma grub pa dag gi tshig / bsgrub bya rigs pas thob pa ni 'dod pa'i tshig tsam las de dag ldog pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la gal te dpe dang gtan tshigs ma grub pa dag gi tshig / bsgrub bya rigs pas thob pa ni 'dod pa'i tshig tsam las de dag ldog pa ma yin te /
translated: If the words of the example and reason that are not established are obtained by reasoning, then the probandum is not refuted by mere words of assertion.

original: me'i dro ba nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: me'i dro ba nyid bzhin no //
translated: It is like the heat of fire.

original: ci ste yang rigs pas thob pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid ma yin gyi /ğŸ”½'on kyang mtshan nyid byed pa nyid 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: ci ste yang rigs pas thob pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid ma yin gyi / 'on kyang mtshan nyid byed pa nyid 'dod pa yin no //
translated: But if it is not obtained by reasoning, then the probandum is not established.ğŸ”½If it is not established, then the example and reason are not established.

original: de nyid tshig gzhan gyis bsgrub par bya ba nyid nye bar sbyor bar byed pa dang / bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa nyid 'gog par byed pa yin no zhe na /ğŸ”½de'i tshe de nyid kyi skyon yin gyi /
analyzed: de nyid tshig gzhan gyis bsgrub par bya ba nyid nye bar sbyor bar byed pa dang / bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa nyid 'gog par byed pa yin no zhe na / de'i tshe de nyid kyi skyon yin gyi /
translated: If the example and reason are not established, then the probandum is not established.

original: gzhan ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin te /
translated: If the probandum is not established, then the example and reason are not established.ğŸ”½If the example and reason are not established, then the probandum is not established.

original: gang zhig des rnam par gzhag pa tsam la gus par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig des rnam par gzhag pa tsam la gus par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: But it is not proper to respect mere establishment by that.

original: 'chad pa po dag nyid 'dod pa kho na bsgrub par bya ba yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'chad pa po dag nyid 'dod pa kho na bsgrub par bya ba yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: For the expounders themselves would be establishing what they themselves accept.

original: gal te rgol bas bsgrub par bya ba nyid du gtan tshigs ma grub pa la sogs pa mi 'dod sgrub pa min no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rgol bas bsgrub par bya ba nyid du gtan tshigs ma grub pa la sogs pa mi 'dod sgrub pa min no zhe na /
translated: If the opponent does not accept the reason as established with regard to the probandum, then it is not established.

original: gal te de lta yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te de lta yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: If that is the case,

original: rgol bas gzhan yang skabs su bab pa ma yin pa nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid du mi 'dod pa'i chos sgrub ma yin te /
analyzed: rgol bas gzhan yang skabs su bab pa ma yin pa nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid du mi 'dod pa'i chos sgrub ma yin te /
translated: then the opponent would not accept the probandum, such as the quality of space, which is not relevant to the context.

original: bsgrub par bya ba nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: de'i tshe byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa /ğŸ”½bsgrub bya min la gnod 'gal ba ci ma yin pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa / bsgrub bya min la gnod 'gal ba ci ma yin pa nyid yin te /
translated: At that time, the quality of space, such as being produced,ğŸ”½is not the probandum, and it is not contradictory.

original: 'gal ba ni bsgrub par bya ba phyin ci log pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba ni bsgrub par bya ba phyin ci log pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because contradiction has the characteristic of being the opposite of the probandum.

original: gzhan yang gal te bstan bcos kyi don thams cad bsgrub par bya ba yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te bstan bcos kyi don thams cad bsgrub par bya ba yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: Moreover, if the entire meaning of the treatise is the probandum,

original: bdag nyid sgra yang don med can yin no //
analyzed: bdag nyid sgra yang don med can yin no //
translated: then the term â€œhimselfâ€ is meaningless.

original: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is it like?

original: phyogs mtshan phyi rol don can gyi'o //
analyzed: phyogs mtshan phyi rol don can gyi'o //
translated: It is the characteristic of a position, and it is external.

original: de ltar na gang gi tshe @283b bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa 'dod par mi 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: de ltar na gang gi tshe @283b bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa 'dod par mi 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
translated: Thus, when the desire of the author of the treatise is not desired,

original: de bsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de bsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: then in order to eliminate that,

original: bdag nyid kyi sgra smos pa don dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi sgra smos pa don dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
translated: the term â€œhimselfâ€ is meaningful.

original: de lta ma yin na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na /
translated: If that were not so,

original: phyogs kyi mtshan nyid la 'khrul par dogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyogs kyi mtshan nyid la 'khrul par dogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: there would be doubt about the characteristic of a position.

original: de bas na rtog pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid kyi sgra brjod par mi 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: de bas na rtog pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid kyi sgra brjod par mi 'gyur ro ;
translated: Therefore, the intelligent one would not utter the term â€œhimself.â€

original: / bstan bcos cung zad sngar khas blangs pa de gang yin pa de bor nas /
analyzed: / bstan bcos cung zad sngar khas blangs pa de gang yin pa de bor nas /
translated: Having abandoned that which was previously accepted as a treatise,

original: rtsod pa'i dus su bdag nyid kyi 'dod pas bstan bcos gzhan la brten pa'i rgol ba yang 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no zhes de ltar na /
analyzed: rtsod pa'i dus su bdag nyid kyi 'dod pas bstan bcos gzhan la brten pa'i rgol ba yang 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no zhes de ltar na /

analyzed: gal te bstan bcos 'di 'jug don can gyi bdag nyid kyi sgra'i brjod par byed pa de ltar na yang bya ba nyid ma yin no //
translated: If this treatise is for the purpose of engagement, then the statement of the self is not an action.

analyzed: de ltar ni gal te 'dod pas bstan bcos 'dzin pa'i rgol bas mi 'thob bo zhes dogs par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /

original: 'di ltar rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar rigs pa ma yin te /

original: 'di ltar dogs pa gang las yin /
analyzed: 'di ltar dogs pa gang las yin /
translated: From where is there such a fear?

original: gang gis na bstan bcos la 'dod pas 'jug pa'i don du bdag nyid kyi sgra byas pa yin /
analyzed: gang gis na bstan bcos la 'dod pas 'jug pa'i don du bdag nyid kyi sgra byas pa yin /
translated: By what is the word self made in the treatise for the purpose of engagement according to one's wishes?

original: de la 'dir rgol ba bdag nyid kyi 'dod pas bstan bcos 'dzin pa tshad ma gnod pa'am gnod par mi 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: de la 'dir rgol ba bdag nyid kyi 'dod pas bstan bcos 'dzin pa tshad ma gnod pa'am gnod par mi 'gyur grang na /

original: de la gal te rgol ba de tshad mas de gnod med na ni /
analyzed: de la gal te rgol ba de tshad mas de gnod med na ni /

analyzed: de'i tshe bstan bcos gzhan 'dzin pa gang gis bzlog par nus /

original: gal te tshad mas gnod yin na /
analyzed: gal te tshad mas gnod yin na /

analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa'i bstan bcos khas blangs pa la'o zhe na /

original: de ltar na yang /
analyzed: de ltar na yang /

analyzed: tshig ni gang las 'jug par 'gyur //

translated: The meaning is that one cannot engage in refuting the acceptance of the desired treatise by the one who is characterized by the word â€œself.â€

original: gzhan yang de dag sngar yang rgol ba grub mtha' ni gang cung zad rang gi 'dod pa nyid kyis 'dzin /
analyzed: gzhan yang de dag sngar yang rgol ba grub mtha' ni gang cung zad rang gi 'dod pa nyid kyis 'dzin /
translated: Moreover, previously they also held a philosophical position, whatever it was, through their own desire.

original: de 'dzin par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de 'dzin par 'gyur ba yin no //

original: ji ltar 'dod pas sngar 'dzin pa de ltar 'dod pa des kyang rnam pa 'ga' ste /
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pas sngar 'dzin pa de ltar 'dod pa des kyang rnam pa 'ga' ste /
translated: Just as they previously held it through their desire, so they would hold it in some way through that desire.

original: sngar gyi bor nas grub pa'i mtha' gzhan dag ni 'dzin thob cis ma yin /
analyzed: sngar gyi bor nas grub pa'i mtha' gzhan dag ni 'dzin thob cis ma yin /
translated: But the other philosophical systems, having abandoned the former, are not held to be obtained.

original: thob pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: thob pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: They are not obtained.

original: de ltar na 'dod pas don thob pa dang phrad pa'i phyir bdag nyid smos pas rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na 'dod pas don thob pa dang phrad pa'i phyir bdag nyid smos pas rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, it is not reasonable to mention oneself in order to obtain the desired object and to meet with it.

original: gal te 'dod pas thob pa gang yin pa de'i don du 'bad rtsol rigs pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /ğŸ”½rgol ba 'dod pa'i bsgrub @284a * //
analyzed: gal te 'dod pas thob pa gang yin pa de'i don du 'bad rtsol rigs pa ma yin pa de'i tshe / rgol ba 'dod pa'i bsgrub @284a * //
translated: If it is not reasonable to strive for the desired object that is obtained by desire,

original: par bya ba yang 'dod pa nyid kyis yongs su len par grub pa yin no //
analyzed: par bya ba yang 'dod pa nyid kyis yongs su len par grub pa yin no //
translated: then at that time, the opponent's desired object to be established is also established as being accepted by desire itself.

original: slob dpon gyis de'i don du bdag nyid smos par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis de'i don du bdag nyid smos par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: The master would not mention himself for that purpose.

original: de ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni ma yin no //
translated: That is not so.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: log par rtogs pa mthong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: log par rtogs pa mthong ba'i phyir /
translated: Because wrong views are seen.

original: rgyu'i phyir te /
analyzed: rgyu'i phyir te /
translated: Because of the cause.

original: log par rtogs pa dag ni mthong ba yin te /
analyzed: log par rtogs pa dag ni mthong ba yin te /
translated: Wrong views are seen,

original: dper na bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa sgrub pa yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa sgrub pa yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: for example, like the desire to compose a treatise.

original: log par rtogs pa de dag bsal bar bya ba'i phyir phyogs kyi mtshan nyid 'dir bdag nyid sgra byas pa yin no //
analyzed: log par rtogs pa de dag bsal bar bya ba'i phyir phyogs kyi mtshan nyid 'dir bdag nyid sgra byas pa yin no //
translated: In order to dispel those misconceptions, the author has composed this treatise, which is characterized by the following:

original: nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa bsal ba ni /
analyzed: nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa bsal ba ni /
translated: The refutation of the properties of space, etc.

original: mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa 'dod gnod med dang / nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa skabs ma yin pa de yang bsgrub bya min no //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa 'dod gnod med dang / nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa skabs ma yin pa de yang bsgrub bya min no //
translated: The properties of impermanence, etc. are not refuted, and the properties of space, etc. are not established.

original: nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa gzhan la gnod pa yod na /
analyzed: nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa gzhan la gnod pa yod na /
translated: If the properties of space, etc. were refuted,

original: mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa 'brel pa med pa gzhan la gnod pa byed pa khas len na ;
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa 'brel pa med pa gzhan la gnod pa byed pa khas len na ;
translated: then the properties of impermanence, etc. would be established.ğŸ”½If the properties of space, etc. were established,ğŸ”½then the properties of impermanence, etc. would be refuted.

original: slob dpon gyis ji skad du bshad pa thug pa med pa bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis ji skad du bshad pa thug pa med pa bstan pa yin no //
translated: The master has shown that this would lead to an infinite regress.

original: gzhung lugs kyis byas khyad par dag pa ste /
analyzed: gzhung lugs kyis byas khyad par dag pa ste /
translated: The properties of the thesis are established by the scriptures.

original: chos can yongs su spangs nas /ğŸ”½gnag rdzi mo yi bar la rab grags pa'i //
analyzed: chos can yongs su spangs nas / gnag rdzi mo yi bar la rab grags pa'i //
translated: The subject is abandoned.ğŸ”½The subject that is well known even to cowherds

original: chos can dag ni gzung don du //
analyzed: chos can dag ni gzung don du //
translated: is accepted as the basis of the debate.

original: gzhan ni bdag nyid sgra brjod zer //
analyzed: gzhan ni bdag nyid sgra brjod zer //
translated: Others say that the word â€œselfâ€ refers to the self.

original: bdag nyid ces bya ba 'dis nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa'i khyad par dang bral ba bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can 'ba' zhig yongs su bzung ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: bdag nyid ces bya ba 'dis nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa'i khyad par dang bral ba bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can 'ba' zhig yongs su bzung ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say, By the word 'itself,' only the subject devoid of the distinctions of being a quality of space, etc. is taken as the predicate of the probandum,

analyzed: gzhung lugs kyis byas pa'i khyad par gyi chos can yongs su btang nas rab tu grags pa'i chos can yongs su bzung ba'i don du bdag nyid kyis sgra bshad pa yin no zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni ma yin te /
translated: then it is not the case that the word 'itself' is explained to mean that the well-known subject is taken, having abandoned the distinguished subject made by the textual system.

analyzed: 'di ltar bdag nyid kyi sgra sbyor ba'i chos can la chos cung zad cig 'ga' zhig gis kyang nye bar 'god pa'am /
translated: Because in that case, no one would posit even the slightest attribute to the subject connected with the word 'itself,'

original: mi 'god pa nyid la 'gog par mi byed do //ğŸ”½de ltar na rang 'dod brtags pa'i khyad par can //
analyzed: mi 'god pa nyid la 'gog par mi byed do // de ltar na rang 'dod brtags pa'i khyad par can //
translated: and it would not be refuted that it is not posited.ğŸ”½Thus, because there is no dispute about the entities

original: dngos po rnams la rtsod med phyir //
analyzed: dngos po rnams la rtsod med phyir //
translated: that have the distinctions imagined by one's own desire,

original: rtsod pa med pa'i rgyu yi phyir //
analyzed: rtsod pa med pa'i rgyu yi phyir //
translated: there is no cause for dispute.

original: brdas nye bar sbyar ba'i chos can ma grub pa la 'ga' zhig kyang khyad par dpyod pa'i rtsom par mi byed do //
analyzed: brdas nye bar sbyar ba'i chos can ma grub pa la 'ga' zhig kyang khyad par dpyod pa'i rtsom par mi byed do //
translated: In the case of a subject that is not established by testimony, one does not undertake an examination of its attributes.

original: 'on kyang spyir chos can grub pa'i ngo bo la khyad par dpyod pa'i rtsom par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'on kyang spyir chos can grub pa'i ngo bo la khyad par dpyod pa'i rtsom par 'gyur te /
translated: But in general, one does undertake an examination of the attributes of a subject that is established.

original: @284b dpyod pa nyid kyi skabs yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: @284b dpyod pa nyid kyi skabs yin pa'i phyir /
translated: For the context is one of examination.

original: rgyu'i phyir / rab grags rten ni chos can ni grub pa yin par 'gyur ba de ltar na /
analyzed: rgyu'i phyir / rab grags rten ni chos can ni grub pa yin par 'gyur ba de ltar na /
translated: And because of the reason, the well-known basis is the established subject.

original: de yongs su gzung ba'i don du bdag nyid kyi sgra sbyor bar rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yongs su gzung ba'i don du bdag nyid kyi sgra sbyor bar rigs pa ma yin te /

analyzed: gzhan yang tshad ma gang yin pa de gzhan la gnod pa byed par 'gyur na /

original: bstan bcos tshad ma nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: bstan bcos tshad ma nyid ma yin no //
translated: then the treatise is not a valid cognition.

original: de ltar na lung rnams tshad ma nyid yin pa'ang /
analyzed: de ltar na lung rnams tshad ma nyid yin pa'ang /
translated: Thus, the validity of the scriptures

original: sngar nyid rnam par bzlog pa yin //
analyzed: sngar nyid rnam par bzlog pa yin //
translated: has already been refuted.

original: de ltar na gang gis gnod pa yin /
analyzed: de ltar na gang gis gnod pa yin /
translated: By what then are they invalidated?

original: de'i phyir na khas blangs nas /
analyzed: de'i phyir na khas blangs nas /
translated: Therefore, having accepted

analyzed: dpyod pa dag la ste bstan bcos la grags pa'i chos can bshad @289b bdag la skyon 'di bstan bcos la gnod pa'i mtshan nyid du 'dod do //
translated: that the subject is well known in the treatise, this fault is asserted to be the characteristic of invalidating the treatise.

original: de'i rten can ma yin pa'i chos can la dpyod pa'i skabs ma yin no //ğŸ”½de'i phyir / bstan pa thag pa'i yul gyi khyad par 'di /
analyzed: de'i rten can ma yin pa'i chos can la dpyod pa'i skabs ma yin no // de'i phyir / bstan pa thag pa'i yul gyi khyad par 'di /
translated: It is not the case that the subject is not based on that.ğŸ”½Therefore,ğŸ”½in order to show the particular object of the teaching,

original: bstan phyir rjes su dpag pa las //
analyzed: bstan phyir rjes su dpag pa las //
translated: it is inferred.

original: phyi rol min yang khas blangs pa //
analyzed: phyi rol min yang khas blangs pa //
translated: Although it is not external, it is accepted.ğŸ”½

original: slob dpon gyis tha dad byas yin no //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis tha dad byas yin no //
translated: Although it is not external, it is distinguished by the master.

original: ji ltar rjes su dpag pa las phyi rol du gyur pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar rjes su dpag pa las phyi rol du gyur pa ma yin zhe na /

original: gnod phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gnod phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, because it is contradictory.

original: gnod pa byed pa'i tshad ma yin te /
analyzed: gnod pa byed pa'i tshad ma yin te /

original: bstan bcos kyang tshad ma byed pa de ltar na tshad ma nyid yin na rjes su dpag pa'i nang du 'du bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: bstan bcos kyang tshad ma byed pa de ltar na tshad ma nyid yin na rjes su dpag pa'i nang du 'du bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: A treatise is a valid means of knowledge in that way. Thus, if it is a valid means of knowledge, it is included within inference.

original: de lta min na bstan bcos kyi rten can nyid dpyod pa la bstan bcos gnod pa byed pa nyid yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: de lta min na bstan bcos kyi rten can nyid dpyod pa la bstan bcos gnod pa byed pa nyid yin pa de ltar na /
translated: If it were not so, the treatise would contradict itself in the analysis of the very basis of the treatise.

original: yul gyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir gal te 'di tha dad par byed pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: yul gyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir gal te 'di tha dad par byed pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: In that case, in order to show the difference in object, he says, if it does not distinguish it, then it is excessive.

original: thal ches par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thal ches par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it does not distinguish it, then it is excessive.

original: rjes su dpag pa la rtags kyi khyad par du ba la sogs pa ci tsam pa de dag gnod pa yang so so tha dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa la rtags kyi khyad par du ba la sogs pa ci tsam pa de dag gnod pa yang so so tha dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The particular reason of inference, such as smoke, would also be individually different contradictions.

original: tha dad byas na don med 'gyur //
analyzed: tha dad byas na don med 'gyur //

original: tha dad byas na 'bras bu med pa can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tha dad byas na 'bras bu med pa can du 'gyur ro //

analyzed: dgos pa yang yod pa yin pa de'i phyir ji skad du bshad pa'i yul gyi khyad par bstan pa 'bras bu yin pa de ltar na kha na mtho ba med pa yin no //

analyzed: gal te tha dad pa'i tshig yul gyi khyad par ston pa'i don yin na /
translated: If the different words have the purpose of teaching the distinction of the object,ğŸ”½then the opponent's words are contradicted by his own statements.

original: rigs pa'i sgo las khas blangs pa las gnod pa las rang gi tshig kyang tha dad pa zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rigs pa'i sgo las khas blangs pa las gnod pa las rang gi tshig kyang tha dad pa zhes bya ba smos te /

analyzed: tshad ma can ma yin pa de dag ni nus pa mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir /

analyzed: gags byed pa 'ba' zhig kho nar 'gyur gyi de la de dag thams cad kyi tshe ni ma yin no //

original: gang gi tshe gcig tshad ma dang ldan pa'i tshig yin par rab tu bstan pa'i don to //
analyzed: gang gi tshe gcig tshad ma dang ldan pa'i tshig yin par rab tu bstan pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the words of a single authoritative person are well-known to be valid.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi rgol bde yis bstan bcos khas blangs ba'i phyir rgyu'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi rgol bde yis bstan bcos khas blangs ba'i phyir rgyu'i phyir te /

original: bstan bcos tshad ma nyid yin no //
analyzed: bstan bcos tshad ma nyid yin no //

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /

analyzed: de dngos kun la gnod byed yin /

original: yul la lar ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: yul la lar ni ma yin no zhe na /

analyzed: gal te bstan bcos tshad ma nyid yin par khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If the treatise is authoritative because it is accepted as authoritative,

analyzed: gnod pa byed par skyes pa de'i tshe / gal te sgrub par byed pa'i dus na bstan bcos @290a * //
translated: when it arises as a contradiction,ğŸ”½if the opponent does not accept that the treatise

analyzed: tshad ma dang gnod pa byed pa yin no zhes rgol ba de mi 'dod pa de'i tshe /
translated: is authoritative and contradictory at the time of proof,

original: cis kyang gnod pa byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: cis kyang gnod pa byed par 'gyur /

original: mi 'gyur ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: mi 'gyur ba nyid yin no //

analyzed: de ltar na 'dod pa de'i skyon de thob par 'gyur gyi /

original: rigs pa las ma yin no //
analyzed: rigs pa las ma yin no //

analyzed: lung de mi 'dod na ni gnod pa byed pa yin par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: kho bo cag gis sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin /

analyzed: rang gi tshig bstan bcos 'gal tha dad med 'gyur pa /

analyzed: shes na de'i tshe don de nyid tshad mas mthong ba yin pa de ltar na /

analyzed: gzhan yang rgol bas khas blangs pa'i phyir /

analyzed: gang gi tshe bstan bcos tshad ma nyid yin pa de'i tshe /

translated: Because the wish of a person does not depend on things,ğŸ”½it is not valid cognition by the power of that.

analyzed: de'i dbang gis tshad ma nyid du yod pa ma yin no snyam du dgongs pa bzhad gad du mdzad pa'o //

analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di ltar /

analyzed: zhes gnas pa yin na /

analyzed: de'i phyir / mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag gi rab grags don dag la /

original: shin tu lkog gyur /
analyzed: shin tu lkog gyur /

analyzed: @290b lung gis bstan pa'i chos can la sogs pa la dpyod pa na /

analyzed: gal te gang gi tshe bstan bcos de tshad ma nyid ma yin pa de'i tshe /

analyzed: bden te 'on kyang bstan bcos 'di la'ang brtag pa'ang phal cher ni /

analyzed: snga phyi 'gal ba brjod yin don dam pa ni ma yin te /
translated: is expressed as a contradiction between earlier and later statements, but it is not ultimate.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs chos min rtsa khrus kyang chos min gnod byed yin zhes bya ba 'gal ba yin no //

analyzed: de skad du bstan bcos la 'dod chags la sogs pa dag ni sdig pa dag pa'i rgyu yin no zhes bshad la / rgyu la gnod pa ma yin na //
translated: In that way, the treatise explains that desire and so on are the cause of purifying misdeeds.ğŸ”½It is not harmful to the cause.

original: rgyu can la gnod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu can la gnod pa ma yin te /

original: de bas na khrus dang bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg la sogs pas /
analyzed: de bas na khrus dang bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg la sogs pas /

analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa la gnod par mi 'gyur ro //

original: gang zhig gang gis rgyu la gnod pa byed pa ma yin pa de ni de la gnod pa byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang gis rgyu la gnod pa byed pa ma yin pa de ni de la gnod pa byed pa ma yin te /

analyzed: dper na bad kan gyi mngar ba dang bsil ba dang / snum pa'i rdzas lta bu'o //
translated: For example, the humors of phlegm, bile, and wind are not harmful to sweet, sour, and pungent substances, respectively.

original: gang gi rgyu la gnod pa byed pa gang yin pa de dag las de bzlog par 'gyur ba nyid yin te /ğŸ”½dper na tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi khyad par dag gis //
analyzed: gang gi rgyu la gnod pa byed pa gang yin pa de dag las de bzlog par 'gyur ba nyid yin te / dper na tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi khyad par dag gis //
translated: That which is harmful to a cause is harmful to what is caused by that cause.ğŸ”½For example, the humors of phlegm, bile, and wind are harmful, respectively, to sour, pungent, and sweet substances.

analyzed: spyod pa ngan pa dang / kun nas dkris pa dang / bag la nyal gyi gnas skabs dag la go rims bzhin du gnod pa byed pa yin no //

analyzed: de bas na rgyu 'di la gnod pa byed pas na rgyu can rnam par gcod pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, since the cause is harmed, the result is eliminated because the cause is eliminated.

original: sdig pa'i rgyu nyid du rnam par gzhag pa 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams khrus la sogs pas sdig pa dag par byed pa'i tshig tu 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: sdig pa'i rgyu nyid du rnam par gzhag pa 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams khrus la sogs pas sdig pa dag par byed pa'i tshig tu 'gal ba yin no //
translated: The causes of sin are desire, hatred, and delusion, and it is contradictory to say that they are purified by bathing, etc.

original: gal te ci tshad mar gyur pa ma yin pa de la phal cher 'gal ba brjod pa'i yang dpyod pa bstan ce na /
analyzed: gal te ci tshad mar gyur pa ma yin pa de la phal cher 'gal ba brjod pa'i yang dpyod pa bstan ce na /
translated: If you ask, â€œWhy is it that the author of a treatise is not a valid person, even though he is not a valid person in the sense of being an authority?

original: 'dir dper na skyes bu 'jug par 'dod pa 'di ni lung gi tshad rma la brten pa gzhag par nus pa ma yin te /ğŸ”½sbyin pa la sogs pa'i sems pa 'jug pa las phan yon @291a * //
analyzed: 'dir dper na skyes bu 'jug par 'dod pa 'di ni lung gi tshad rma la brten pa gzhag par nus pa ma yin te / sbyin pa la sogs pa'i sems pa 'jug pa las phan yon @291a * //
translated: â€ we reply: It is like the following analogy: A person who wishes to enter a house cannot enter it by relying on a treatise on houses.

original: chen po thob pa'i phyir dang / 'tshe ba la sogs pa'i sems pa rnams kyis ngan song chen po thob pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chen po thob pa'i phyir dang / 'tshe ba la sogs pa'i sems pa rnams kyis ngan song chen po thob pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because he has obtained great benefits from engaging in the thought of generosity, etc., and because he has obtained great misfortune from engaging in the thought of harming, etc.

original: de ltar na bstan bcos gzung bar bya ba yin no /
analyzed: de ltar na bstan bcos gzung bar bya ba yin no /
translated: Thus, the treatise should be accepted.

original: bstan bcos gnod byed gang yin /
analyzed: bstan bcos gnod byed gang yin /

original: rigs pas grub pa ste /
analyzed: rigs pas grub pa ste /
translated: It is that which is established by reasoning.

original: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i yul lo //
analyzed: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa'i yul lo //
translated: It is the object of direct perception and inference.

original: rang gi tshig gis gnod med gang //
analyzed: rang gi tshig gis gnod med gang //
translated: What is not contradicted by oneâ€™s own words,

original: mthong ba med pa la'ang ste shin tu lkog tu gyur pa la'o de gzung bya yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mthong ba med pa la'ang ste shin tu lkog tu gyur pa la'o de gzung bya yin pa'i phyir /
translated: and what is not seen, even though it is very hidden, is to be accepted, because it is apprehended.

original: de la snga phyi 'gal ba'i dpyod 'jug 'gyur /

analyzed: skyes bu'i 'dod dang rjes 'brel pa'o //

translated: And the treatise is also like that, because it is the very basis of the occasion of the dispute, and because it accepts the analysis that obtains the third position, the thesis of validity. Thus, oneâ€™s own words and the treatise are born to be the refuters.
