translated: The term â€œto be heardâ€ explains the nature of sound, which is the domain of the sense faculty.

original: rang gi chos can zhes bya ba de /
analyzed: rang gi chos can zhes bya ba de /
translated: The so-called subject

original: rgol ba kun la zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /ğŸ”½kun la ste rtsod pa'i dus sam /
analyzed: rgol ba kun la zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de / kun la ste rtsod pa'i dus sam /
translated: is in relation to all disputants.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i dus su rgol ba bdag nyid kyis bsgrub byar 'dod pa'i chos gang yin /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i dus su rgol ba bdag nyid kyis bsgrub byar 'dod pa'i chos gang yin /
translated: In relation to all, that is, at the time of debate or at the time of proof, whatever phenomenon the disputant himself asserts to be the predicate of the probandum,

original: chos de ldan la rgol bas bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa'i chos dang ldan pa la'o //
analyzed: chos de ldan la rgol bas bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa'i chos dang ldan pa la'o //
translated: the subject is that which possesses the property asserted by the disputant to be the predicate of the probandum.

original: chos can de dam bca' ba'i don la rnam pa gzhan zhig gis gnod 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: chos can de dam bca' ba'i don la rnam pa gzhan zhig gis gnod 'gyur gyi /
translated: The subject is undermined by another mode in relation to the meaning of the thesis,

original: rgol bas bsgrub par 'dod pa ma yin pa'i chos gzhan de dang ldan pa'i chos can la ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rgol bas bsgrub par 'dod pa ma yin pa'i chos gzhan de dang ldan pa'i chos can la ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: but not in relation to the subject that possesses a property that is not asserted to be the predicate of the probandum by the disputant.

original: rang gi chos can zhes smos pa yin no //ğŸ”½gzhan du chos can gzhan la ni ste /
analyzed: rang gi chos can zhes smos pa yin no // gzhan du chos can gzhan la ni ste /
translated: In order to demonstrate this, the phrase â€œhis own subjectâ€ is stated.ğŸ”½In relation to another subject,ğŸ”½if there is an undermining of another property that is not relevant,

original: skabs su bab pa ma yin pa'i chos gzhan gyi chos can la gnod pa yin na /
analyzed: skabs su bab pa ma yin pa'i chos gzhan gyi chos can la gnod pa yin na /
translated: then

original: skabs su bab pa'i chos can gyis skabs su bab pa'i bsgrub par bya ba 'di la ci zhig bkag / gang gis na de'i dgos pa bzlog pa'i don du 'di 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i tshig tu 'gyur /ğŸ”½chos can 'di nyid la gnod pa yod @296a * //
analyzed: skabs su bab pa'i chos can gyis skabs su bab pa'i bsgrub par bya ba 'di la ci zhig bkag / gang gis na de'i dgos pa bzlog pa'i don du 'di 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i tshig tu 'gyur / chos can 'di nyid la gnod pa yod @296a * //
translated: By what means would this statement be one that has a result, in the sense of reversing the purpose of the opponent?

original: pa skyon yin gyi /
analyzed: pa skyon yin gyi /
translated: The fault lies in the fact that there is a contradiction in this very subject.ğŸ”½It does not lie in another subject.

original: chos can gzhan la ni ma yin no zhes rtogs pa'i don du rang gi chos can la zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: chos can gzhan la ni ma yin no zhes rtogs pa'i don du rang gi chos can la zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: The phrase â€œin relation to its own subjectâ€ is stated in order to understand this point.

original: de bas skabs su bab pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i chos can la gnod par 'gyur ba don der 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas skabs su bab pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i chos can la gnod par 'gyur ba don der 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the fault lies in the fact that there is a contradiction in the subject that is endowed with the property that is at hand.

original: gal te de'i don can gyi rang gi chos can zhes smos par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te de'i don can gyi rang gi chos can zhes smos par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: If one were to say â€œin relation to its own subject,â€ the meaning of that would not be stated.

original: bdag nyid ces bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyis don 'di thob pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid ces bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyis don 'di thob pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: The meaning of this would be obtained simply by saying â€œin itself.â€

original: de ltar na rgol ba bdag nyid bsgrub bar bya bar 'dod pa de bsgrub par bya ba yin pa de bas na de bzlog na gnod pa can no zhes bya ba 'di don gyis grub pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar na rgol ba bdag nyid bsgrub bar bya bar 'dod pa de bsgrub par bya ba yin pa de bas na de bzlog na gnod pa can no zhes bya ba 'di don gyis grub pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Thus, the opponent himself is the probandum, and since he is the probandum, it is established by implication that if he is refuted, there is a fault.

original: bden te bdag nyid kyis zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyis 'di don rtogs la /
analyzed: bden te bdag nyid kyis zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyis 'di don rtogs la /
translated: It is true that the meaning of this is understood by the characteristic â€œhimself,â€

original: rang gi chos can tshig kyang ni //
analyzed: rang gi chos can tshig kyang ni //
translated: but the word â€œonlyâ€ is statedğŸ”½because the probandum is only the property of the subject.

original: byas pa gang yin pa de bsgrub par bya ba'i chos 'ba' zhig la gnod pa yin na /
analyzed: byas pa gang yin pa de bsgrub par bya ba'i chos 'ba' zhig la gnod pa yin na /
translated: If the probandum is only the property of the subject, then when the property of the subject is refuted, the probandum is refuted.

original: gnod par 'gyur ba yin gyi 'on kyang chos can dag la gnod na yang /
analyzed: gnod par 'gyur ba yin gyi 'on kyang chos can dag la gnod na yang /
translated: But if the subject is refuted, the probandum is also refuted.

original: rnam pa 'ga' zhig gnod 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don 'di grags phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa 'ga' zhig gnod 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don 'di grags phyir ro //
translated: This is the meaning of the statement â€œin some way the probandum is refuted.â€ğŸ”½Why is it that when the subject of the probandum is refuted, the probandum is refuted?

original: ci'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la gnod pa bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la gnod pa yin zhe na /ğŸ”½rten dag la gnod pa yis //ğŸ”½rgyu yis de rten pa la ste /
analyzed: ci'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la gnod pa bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la gnod pa yin zhe na / rten dag la gnod pa yis // rgyu yis de rten pa la ste /
translated: Because the refutation of the basisğŸ”½is the refutation of that which is based on it.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la 'gal phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la 'gal phyir ro //
translated: The probandum is refuted because it is contradictory to the property of the subject.

original: thams cad du tshogs ba nyid la gnod pa yin te /
analyzed: thams cad du tshogs ba nyid la gnod pa yin te /
translated: In all cases, the subject itself is harmed.

original: 'on kyang 'ga' zhig tu chos kyi sgo dang 'ga' zhig tu chos can gyi sgo zhes bya ba ni khyad par yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'ga' zhig tu chos kyi sgo dang 'ga' zhig tu chos can gyi sgo zhes bya ba ni khyad par yin no //
translated: However, there is a difference in that in some cases the door of the subject is harmed, and in some cases the door of the predicate is harmed.

original: gzhan du gang gi tshe chos can la yang gnod pa na /
analyzed: gzhan du gang gi tshe chos can la yang gnod pa na /
translated: In other cases, when the subject is harmed,

original: chos can de la gnod pa rtogs par bya ba'i don du rang gi chos can gyi tshig mi 'dod pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: chos can de la gnod pa rtogs par bya ba'i don du rang gi chos can gyi tshig mi 'dod pa de'i tshe /
translated: in order to understand that the subject is harmed, one does not assert the words of one's own subject.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid du 'dod pa de lta'i rnam can chos /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid du 'dod pa de lta'i rnam can chos /
translated: At that time, the property that has the aspect of the probandum

original: bsgrub bya yin zhes brjod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bsgrub bya yin zhes brjod pa'i phyir //
translated: is said to be the probandum.ğŸ”½Because of the reason,

original: rgyu'i phyir / de la gnod pa yin pa ste //
analyzed: rgyu'i phyir / de la gnod pa yin pa ste //
translated: there is harm to that.

original: de ltar na skabs su bab pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i chos de nyid la gnod pa de'i sgo nas 'ongs pa gang yin pa de nyid la gnod pa yin par bsgrub bar sems kyi chos can la gnod pa yang gnod pa ma yin /
analyzed: de ltar na skabs su bab pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i chos de nyid la gnod pa de'i sgo nas 'ongs pa gang yin pa de nyid la gnod pa yin par bsgrub bar sems kyi chos can la gnod pa yang gnod pa ma yin /
translated: Thus, that which comes through the door of harm to the very property to be proven in the present context is itself the harm. One thinks that the harm to the subject is not harm.

original: de yang 'dod pa yin te /
analyzed: de yang 'dod pa yin te /
translated: And that is accepted.

original: tshig med par bstan par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tshig med par bstan par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not possible to demonstrate it without words.

original: de phyir rang gi chos can tshig / byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de phyir rang gi chos can tshig / byas pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the word â€œsubjectâ€ is used.

original: de don gyis grub ma yin na //
analyzed: de don gyis grub ma yin na //
translated: If it is not established by the meaning,

original: de ltar na re zhig chos la gnod pa la reg pas gnod pa yin la de yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la dngos su gnod bar 'gyur ba'am /ğŸ”½chos can @296b la gnod pa'i sgo nas yin grang na /
analyzed: de ltar na re zhig chos la gnod pa la reg pas gnod pa yin la de yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la dngos su gnod bar 'gyur ba'am / chos can @296b la gnod pa'i sgo nas yin grang na /
translated: In that case, the subject is harmed by the contradiction, and that contradiction is either a contradiction with the property of the thesis itself, or it is a contradiction with the subject.

original: rnam pa gnyi ga ltar yang chos la gnod pa de bas na gnod pas chos can la gnod pa yang don gyis thob pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyi ga ltar yang chos la gnod pa de bas na gnod pas chos can la gnod pa yang don gyis thob pa yin no //
translated: In either case, the subject is harmed by the contradiction. Therefore, the contradiction with the subject is implied by the contradiction with the property.

original: de ltar na don can gyi chos can gyi tshig brjod par bya ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar na don can gyi chos can gyi tshig brjod par bya ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then the word â€œsubjectâ€ should not be used, since it has no meaning.

original: de ni bden te chos can 'gog pa gang la bsgrub par bya ba'i chos 'gog bar 'gyur zhing yul gang la chos can 'gog pa na yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la cung zad kyang gnod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni bden te chos can 'gog pa gang la bsgrub par bya ba'i chos 'gog bar 'gyur zhing yul gang la chos can 'gog pa na yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la cung zad kyang gnod pa ma yin no //
translated: That is true, but the subject is refuted in such a way that the property of the thesis is refuted, and the subject is refuted in such a way that the object is not harmed in the least by the contradiction with the property of the thesis.

original: de la yang rgol ba 'ga' zhig chos can ni /
analyzed: de la yang rgol ba 'ga' zhig chos can ni /
translated: Some opponents maintain that the subject is faulty

original: 'ba' zhig 'gal ba yin na yang //ğŸ”½skyon dang ldan par khas len to //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig 'gal ba yin na yang // skyon dang ldan par khas len to //
translated: Even though there is no contradiction.

original: dam bca' ba'i skyon dang 'gal bas skyon dang ldan par 'dod do //ğŸ”½de ni dper na sngon med do gzhan gyis //
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i skyon dang 'gal bas skyon dang ldan par 'dod do // de ni dper na sngon med do gzhan gyis //
translated: They maintain that it is faulty because it contradicts the thesis.ğŸ”½For example, space and so on are not unproduced,

original: bskyed bya min ltar nam mkha' la sogs min //
analyzed: bskyed bya min ltar nam mkha' la sogs min //
translated: Because they are not produced by another.

original: nam mkha' la sogs pa ni lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen rnams kyis phul du byung bar byar med pa'i rang bzhin te gcig gi rang bzhin du gnas pa dang bral ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: nam mkha' la sogs pa ni lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen rnams kyis phul du byung bar byar med pa'i rang bzhin te gcig gi rang bzhin du gnas pa dang bral ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Space and so on are not the nature of a single entity that is devoid of the nature of being produced by a collection of causes and conditions.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: cig car sgra sogs rgyu min phyir //
analyzed: cig car sgra sogs rgyu min phyir //
translated: Because sound and so on are not simultaneous causes.

original: cig car 'bras bu mi byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: cig car 'bras bu mi byed pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they do not produce effects simultaneously.

original: nam mkha' la sogs pa'i chos can dngos po'i rang bzhin yin nam ma yin zhes brjod par 'dod pa khas mi len pa /
analyzed: nam mkha' la sogs pa'i chos can dngos po'i rang bzhin yin nam ma yin zhes brjod par 'dod pa khas mi len pa /
translated: The subject, space and so on, is either the nature of an entity or not.

original: nam mkha' med par smra bas spyir nam mkha' la sogs pa'i skabs la chos rnam par gcod pa tsam bsgrub par bya ba dang / rnam par gcod pa'i ngo bo'i gtan tshigs 'bras bu cig car mi byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad pa la gal te sun 'byin byed pa 'ga' zhig gis 'gal smra ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' med par smra bas spyir nam mkha' la sogs pa'i skabs la chos rnam par gcod pa tsam bsgrub par bya ba dang / rnam par gcod pa'i ngo bo'i gtan tshigs 'bras bu cig car mi byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad pa la gal te sun 'byin byed pa 'ga' zhig gis 'gal smra ste /
translated: The one who advocates the non-existence of space, in the context of space, etc., establishes the mere exclusion of a positive object, and the reason which is the nature of the exclusion does not simultaneously produce the effect.ğŸ”½ If someone objects, You are contradicting yourself!

original: dper na nam mkha' sogs chos can dngos med kyi /
analyzed: dper na nam mkha' sogs chos can dngos med kyi /
translated: For example, the subject, space, etc., is a non-entity,

original: ngo bo nyid kyang de dang 'dra //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyang de dang 'dra //
translated: and its nature is also like that.

original: nam mkha' la sogs pa'i chos can dngos po'i rang bzhin du gyur pa med par yang sgrub par byed pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' la sogs pa'i chos can dngos po'i rang bzhin du gyur pa med par yang sgrub par byed pa lta bu'o //
translated: One establishes that the subject, space, etc., is not the nature of an entity.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i chos can bsal ba na yang /ğŸ”½de ltar bsgrub byar 'dod pa la gnod pa ci yang med pa yin pa'am /
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i chos can bsal ba na yang / de ltar bsgrub byar 'dod pa la gnod pa ci yang med pa yin pa'am /
translated: When such a subject is excluded,ğŸ”½there is no contradiction at all in asserting it as the object of affirmation,

original: gtan tshigs rnam par gcod pa'i ngo bo ma grub pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs rnam par gcod pa'i ngo bo ma grub pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: and the reason which is the nature of the exclusion is not unestablished.

original: 'dir yang chos can 'ba' zhig 'gog pa yang gnod pa 'dod pa yin na yang mi 'dod de /
analyzed: 'dir yang chos can 'ba' zhig 'gog pa yang gnod pa 'dod pa yin na yang mi 'dod de /
translated: Here, too, if you maintain that the mere subject is refuted, then that is not maintained.

original: chos can dngos por gyur pa bsal ba na yang bsgrub par bya ba rnam par gcod pa'i ngo bo grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos can dngos por gyur pa bsal ba na yang bsgrub par bya ba rnam par gcod pa'i ngo bo grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For, when the subject is eliminated, the nature of the exclusion of the probandum is established.

original: des na gnyi ga bsgrub bya nyid yin na /
analyzed: des na gnyi ga bsgrub bya nyid yin na /
translated: Therefore, if both are the probandum,

original: khas len par byed na /ğŸ”½chos can la ni gnod pa gang /
analyzed: khas len par byed na / chos can la ni gnod pa gang /
translated: then if you accept

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos 'gog par 'gyur ro //ğŸ”½de la bsgrub par @297a * //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos 'gog par 'gyur ro // de la bsgrub par @297a * //
translated: that the subject is refuted,ğŸ”½then the probandum is refuted.

original: bya ba la gnod pa ste /
analyzed: bya ba la gnod pa ste /
translated: In that case, the probandum is refuted,ğŸ”½but if the subject is refuted, the probandum is not refuted.

original: gang chos can 'gog pa yang bsgrub par bya ba la gnod pa med pa de la skyon ma yin te /
analyzed: gang chos can 'gog pa yang bsgrub par bya ba la gnod pa med pa de la skyon ma yin te /
translated: That is not a fault,

original: dper na gtan tshigs bstan ma thag ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na gtan tshigs bstan ma thag ba lta bu'o //
translated: like the just-taught reason.

original: de'i rang gi chos can smos pa des ni brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i rang gi chos can smos pa des ni brjod pa yin no //
translated: By mentioning its own subject, it is stated.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de lta'i chos can nyid kyang 'dir rang gi bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi khyad par du bya ba'i chos can bsgrub bya nyid phyir yan gar min /
analyzed: de lta'i chos can nyid kyang 'dir rang gi bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi khyad par du bya ba'i chos can bsgrub bya nyid phyir yan gar min /
translated: Moreover, the subject itself is not alone, because it is the subject that is qualified by the specific predicate of the probandum.

original: gang gis na yang gar ba 'di 'gog pa na yang gnod par 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gis na yang gar ba 'di 'gog pa na yang gnod par 'gyur /
translated: So when the opponent refutes the subject, he is also refuting the predicate.

original: des na bsgrub par bya ba rnam par gcod pa tsam yin na /
analyzed: des na bsgrub par bya ba rnam par gcod pa tsam yin na /
translated: Therefore, if the probandum is merely the exclusion of the predicate,

original: de'i chos can dngos por gyur pa de ma yin na /
analyzed: de'i chos can dngos por gyur pa de ma yin na /
translated: and the subject of that is not a real entity,

original: gang gis na de bsal ba na rang gi chos can bsal ba'i phyir 'gal ba nyid yin par 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gis na de bsal ba na rang gi chos can bsal ba'i phyir 'gal ba nyid yin par 'gyur /
translated: how could it be contradictory to refute the predicate while not refuting the subject?

original: gal te de ltar bsgrub par bya ba'i chas 'gog pa ni /
analyzed: gal te de ltar bsgrub par bya ba'i chas 'gog pa ni /
translated: If the refutation of the probandum

original: chos can la gnod pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: chos can la gnod pa de'i tshe /
translated: damages the subject,

original: 'dir grangs can pa la sangs rgyas pas brjod pa'i gtan tshigs la gnod 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dir grangs can pa la sangs rgyas pas brjod pa'i gtan tshigs la gnod 'gyur te /
translated: then the Buddhistâ€™s argument against the SÄá¹ƒkhya will be damaged.

original: dper na / cig car sgra sogs rgyu med phyir //
analyzed: dper na / cig car sgra sogs rgyu med phyir //
translated: For example, â€œSound and so on are not produced by another, because they are not produced causelessly.

original: bde sogs gzhan gyis bskyed bya min //
analyzed: bde sogs gzhan gyis bskyed bya min //
translated: Pleasure and so on are not produced by another,ğŸ”½because they are not produced causelessly.

original: nus can ma yin te /
analyzed: nus can ma yin te /
translated: They are not capable of producing themselves.

original: lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen gyis phul du dbyung du byar med pa'i rang bzhin can yin no //
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen gyis phul du dbyung du byar med pa'i rang bzhin can yin no //
translated: and it is not susceptible to being enhanced by cooperative conditions.

original: rim ma yin pas na 'bras bu byed pa ma yan pa'i phyir zhes gtan tshigs brjod pa la /
analyzed: rim ma yin pas na 'bras bu byed pa ma yan pa'i phyir zhes gtan tshigs brjod pa la /
translated: The reason is stated: â€œbecause it does not produce an effect in a non-successive manner.â€

original: snga ma bzhin te sun 'byin par byed pas bde ba la sogs pa rtag pa nyid kyi dang gzhan gyi chos can med pa yang sgrub par byed do zhes bya ba'i 'gal bas /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin te sun 'byin par byed pas bde ba la sogs pa rtag pa nyid kyi dang gzhan gyi chos can med pa yang sgrub par byed do zhes bya ba'i 'gal bas /
translated: The response is the same as before: the reason is contradictory because it proves the opposite of the property of the subject, i.e., that pleasure, etc., is permanent.

original: chos can la gnod pa brjod pas na gtan tshigs 'gal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: chos can la gnod pa brjod pas na gtan tshigs 'gal bar 'gyur te /
translated: The reason is contradictory because it contradicts the property of the subject.

original: shugs kyi bde ba la sogs pa mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin du bsgrub par 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi yin no //
analyzed: shugs kyi bde ba la sogs pa mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin du bsgrub par 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi yin no //
translated: The opponentâ€™s intention is to prove that pleasure, etc., is impermanent by implication.

original: de de ltar ni ma yin na /
analyzed: de de ltar ni ma yin na /
translated: This is not so.

original: gal te gtan tshigs nges yin na //
analyzed: gal te gtan tshigs nges yin na //
translated: If the reason is definite,

original: de la 'gal ba nyid 'gyur te //
analyzed: de la 'gal ba nyid 'gyur te //
translated: then it is contradictory.

original: bde ba la sogs pa dngos por gyur pa mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin de ltar bsgrub pa'i phyir dang / chos can bkag pas bsgrub bar bya ba'i chos la gnod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa dngos por gyur pa mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin de ltar bsgrub pa'i phyir dang / chos can bkag pas bsgrub bar bya ba'i chos la gnod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is established that pleasure, etc., which are entities, have the nature of impermanence, and because the refutation of the subject undermines the property to be established.

original: 'di ltar rim bzhin byed pa gtan tshigs nyid du bzung ba gang yin pa de yang bde ba la sogs pa 'di dag ni /ğŸ”½rim bzhin byed dang mi rtag nyid //
analyzed: 'di ltar rim bzhin byed pa gtan tshigs nyid du bzung ba gang yin pa de yang bde ba la sogs pa 'di dag ni / rim bzhin byed dang mi rtag nyid //
